metadata.title: CVE-2019-8396 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer overflow in H5O__layout_encode in H5Olayout.c in the HDF HDF5through 1.10.4 library allows attackers to cause a denial of service via acrafted HDF5 file. This issue was triggered while repacking an HDF5 file,aka "Invalid write of size 2."

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
